body_text:
Yeah, I'm not sure about that. If it is stored in arguments, then we kind of get that for free. If we don't do that then things get tricky. I guess it could be only for new recipes?
Alternatively, can we just have a big warning box here, or something else instead of a check box?
body:
Yeah, I'm not sure about that. If it is stored in arguments, then we kind of get that for free. If we don't do that then things get tricky. I guess it could be only for new recipes?

Alternatively, can we just have a big warning box here, or something else instead of a check box?
body_html:
Yeah, I'm not sure about that. If it is stored in arguments, then we kind of get that for free. If we don't do that then things get tricky. I guess it could be only for new recipes?

Alternatively, can we just have a big warning box here, or something else instead of a check box?
